title: The Ringer NBA Show Post-Draft Special
description:
The Ringer’s draft mavens Kevin O’Connor, Jonathan Tjarks, and J. Kyle Mann convene the morning after the 2020 NBA draft to go over the top three picks (1:00) as well as the picks and trades that most intrigue them (32:00). 
Hosts: Kevin O’Connor, Jonathan Tjarks, J. Kyle Mann
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
